name: Stripe & RevenueCat No-Website Example
description: Redirect to Stripe checkout and process payments, without needing a website.

RC_API_KEY.description: Your RevenueCat app API key. Required.

STRIPE_KEY.description: Stripe's API key, can be test key or production key. Required.

STRIPE_KEY_TEST.description: Stripe's Test API key, can be test key or production key. Required.

TEST_MODE.description: Whether or not the test key should be used. Required.

SUCCESS_URL.description: The URL redirect URL after a successful purchase. Required.

CANCEL_URL.description: The URL redirect URL after a purchase is cancelled. Required.
